Plugin.Details: This plugin provides the Appengine cloud plugin.

Cloud.Description: Bug history information stored at theflybush.appspot.com
Cloud.Details: Information about bug history and evaluations are stored Google AppEngine at http://theflybush.appspot.com

Cloud.Description: Bug history information stored at findbugs-cloud.appspot.com
Cloud.Details: Information about bug history and evaluations are stored Google AppEngine at http://findbugs-cloud.appspot.com
